title: un tiruvaDivam
sahitya:
un tiruvaDivam enniru kaNNilum enrumE kuDi koLLa vENDumE murugA


anupallavi

  punnakai tavazhumun pavazha shevvidazhin inbap-polivinAl tunbak-kali pOkkum


caraNam    ponnira shirappODu pannirat-tigazh tOghai vannamA mayilODum vaLLi deivAnaiyODum
shennira sEvarkkoDi tannaiyoru karamEndi pinnoru karam tanil minnumOr vElEndum
